thread.title: MATTA President Hamzah Rahmat conferred with D.P.S.M. by Tuan Yang Terutama Yang di-Pertua Negeri Melaka Tun Datuk Seri Utama Mohd Khalil Bin YaakobTravelandtourworld.com

author: travelandtourworld.com
title: MATTA President Hamzah Rahmat conferred with D.P.S.M. by Tuan Yang Terutama Yang di-Pertua Negeri Melaka Tun Datuk Seri Utama Mohd Khalil Bin YaakobTravelandtourworld.com
text:
MATTA President Hamzah Rahmat conferred with D.P.S.M. by Tuan Yang Terutama Yang di-Pertua Negeri Melaka Tun Datuk Seri Utama Mohd Khalil Bin Yaakob Published on : Monday, October 12, 2015
Malaysian Association of Tour and Travel Agents (MATTA) President Hamzah Rahmat was conferred with the award DARJAH PANGKUAN SERI MELAKA (D.P.S.M.) award which carries the title “DATUK”.
The award was in conjunction with Tuan Yang Terutama Yang di-Pertua Negeri Melaka 77th Official Birthday on 9 October 2015.
On behalf of the MATTA Executive Council, members and secretariat staff, I wish to congratulate our President Yang Berbahagia Datuk Hj Hamzah Rahmat for receiving the
award.
The award is not only a personal recognition to Datuk Hj Hamzah, but also to MATTA’s
contribution to the tourism industry as a whole.
Source:- MATTA
